#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#define MAX 1000000007
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    long long C,T,R,N,K,ans,i;
    cin>>T;
    while(T--){
        cin>>C>>R;
        R=C-R;
        ans=1;
        while(C>R){
            ans=(ans*C)%MAX;
            --C;
        }
        cout<<ans<<endl<<endl;
    }
       return 0;
}
